trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the expectations regarding headers of a SOAP message are not satisfied when the message is processed.
trans-unit.target: 處理訊息時，因無法符合有關 SOAP 訊息標頭的預期而所擲回的例外狀況 (Exception)。

trans-unit.source: This exception is typically thrown when there are too many headers or headers are missing from the message.
trans-unit.target: 當標頭過多或訊息的標頭遺漏時，通常會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This can include infrastructure headers such as the Action and Reliable Message headers.
trans-unit.target: 這會包含基礎結構標頭，例如動作和可靠訊息標頭。

trans-unit.source: This exception derives from <xref:System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException>, which in turn derives from <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException>，而後者又衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> class represents a class of recoverable errors that may be thrown during communication between endpoints and that robust [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] client and service applications are expected to handle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> 類別代表在端點間進行通訊時可能會擲回之可修復的錯誤類別，穩定的用戶端與服務 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 應用程式應能處理此狀況。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the more generic <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> handler from catching the more specific <xref:System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException>, catch this exception prior to handling <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免由比較泛型的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> 處理常式來攔截比較特定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException>，請在處理 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> 之前攔截此例外狀況 (Exception)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you want to pass an error message to the user, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要將錯誤訊息傳遞給使用者，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException.%23ctor%28System.String%29> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If you want to pass an error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of the exception to the user, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要將錯誤訊息與造成例外狀況的內部例外狀況參考傳遞給使用者，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If you want to pass serialization information and streaming context, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳遞序列化資訊和資料流內容，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message carried in the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況所包含的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message to the user.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要傳遞錯誤訊息給使用者時，可以使用此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users.
trans-unit.target: 訊息參數的內容應該要能夠讓目標使用者了解。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class used to deserialize data into a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體，用來將資料還原序列化到 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to restore the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式，以還原在資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the multiple message header is a duplicate; <see langword="false" /> if there are no message headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個訊息標頭重複，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有任何訊息標頭，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class using the specified message and a value that indicates whether the message header is a duplicate or is missing.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息以及表示訊息標頭是否重複或遺漏的值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that contains the inner exception that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 包含造成此例外狀況之內部例外狀況的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class using the specified message and the inner exception that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息和造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message and information about an inner exception up to the user.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要傳遞錯誤訊息和有關內部例外狀況的資訊給使用者時，請使用此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users.
trans-unit.target: 訊息參數的內容應該要能夠讓目標使用者了解。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳遞到建構函式中相同的值，如果 `null` 屬性沒有將內部例外狀況值提供給建構函式，則會傳回 `Nothing` 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class using the specified message, header name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息、標頭名稱和命名空間，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the multiple message header is a duplicate; <see langword="false" /> if there are no message headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個訊息標頭重複，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有任何訊息標頭，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class using the specified message, header name and namespace, and a value that indicates whether the message header is a duplicate or is missing.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息、標頭名稱、命名空間，以及表示訊息標頭是否重複或遺漏的值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that contains the inner exception that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 包含造成此例外狀況之內部例外狀況的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class using the specified message, header name and namespace, and the inner exception that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息、標頭名稱、命名空間，以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the multiple message header is a duplicate; <see langword="false" /> if there are no message headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個訊息標頭重複，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有任何訊息標頭，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that contains the inner exception that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 包含造成此例外狀況之內部例外狀況的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> class using the specified message, header name and namespace, a value that indicates whether the message header is a duplicate or is missing, and the inner exception that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息、標頭名稱、命名空間、表示訊息標頭是否重複或遺漏的值，以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the SOAP header that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得造成此例外狀況的 SOAP 標頭名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace of the SOAP header that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得造成此例外狀況之 SOAP 標頭的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there are multiple message headers or no message headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否有多個訊息標頭，或沒有訊息標頭。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the multiple message header is a duplicate; <see langword="false" /> if there are no message headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個訊息標頭重複，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有任何訊息標頭，則為 <see langword="false" />。
